caption.p:
Comparative SF-36 summary scores. SF-36 component summary scores for groups with a sickle cell leg ulcer, diabetic foot ulcer, [ 34] hemodialysis, [ 35] chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), [ 36] operated lung cancer, [ 37] or myocardial infarction. [ 38]
Note: The normative mean for the general population is 50 ± 10. [ 24]
